content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good day, Ryanah. Thank you for visiting our apartment. We appreciate your interest. Based on the current market rates in Munich, we believe that a monthly rental price of 700 Euro would be reasonable. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current demand in the rental market. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: What is the size of the apartment? How many rooms does it have?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: The apartment has a size of 25 square meters and has one bedroom and one living room.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro. What is the monthly rental price?

Also, what is the move-in date?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro per month for the rental of the apartment. The move-in date is flexible, but we prefer a move-in date of no later than the 1st of the next month. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
